pageTitle: SusDoX Login - Securely view radiological images and reports online
pageDescription: SusDoX handles the transmission of documents in healthcare, ensuring document availability in treatment. With SusDoX WebView, you can view your images and reports online at any time.

sharedContent.contentSloganText:
With SusDoX WebView, you can view your
images and reports online at any time.
sharedContent.doctorSloganText: With SUSDOX, you have images & reports available simply, quickly, and securely during treatment.
sharedContent.patientSloganText: With your code, you always have access to images & reports and can personally authorize doctors of your choice.

content.serviceNotice: SusDoX is a Service of SustSol GmbH
content.doctormiscHintText: As a doctor, I have not yet received my login details and want to view the examinations with the code of the patient.
content.doctormiscNoLoginDataText: As a doctor, I have not yet received or forgotten my login details?
content.doctormiscGetLoginDataLinkText:
Request access for doctors & clinics
Help & Support
content.codeLoginHeadingText: Access with Date of Birth and Code
content.codeLoginHintText: You received an access code during your examination:
content.codeLoginNoCodeQuestionText: Didn't receive or forgot the code?
content.codeLoginNoCodeHintText:
Did you provide your mobile number during your examination? Then you can request your personal login code now using your social security number.
You will receive it via SMS on your mobile phone.
content.codeLogin404ErrorText:
Login with the provided data is not possible!
Please check your inputs or try again later!
content.codeLogin401ErrorText:
Login with the provided data is not possible!
Please check your inputs or try again later!
content.codeLoginRenewErrorText:
Login with the provided data is not possible!
Please check your inputs or try again later!
content.requestCodeHintText:
Did you provide your mobile number during your examination? Then you can request your personal code by providing your date of birth.
You will receive it via SMS on your mobile phone.
content.compatibilityLoginHeadingText: Access with PIN Code and SSN
content.compatibilityLoginHintText: Your examination was a while ago and you received a PIN code or an AUTH code instead of the login code. You can log in as usual here.
content.copmatibilityLoginNoATHintText:
Without an Austrian social security number (e-card), you cannot request a code via SMS.

Please contact your radiologist/institute.
content.compatibilityViewSubtext: With SUSDOX, you have images & reports simply, quickly, and securely available. With your access code, you can authorize doctors of your choice yourself.
content.svnLoginHintText: You have a social security number and received a PIN code during your examination
content.svnLoginNoPinQuestionText: Didn't receive or forgot the PIN code?
content.svnLoginNoPinTitleButtonText:
I don't have the SusDoX Code?
-> Request here
content.svnLoginNoPinHintText:
You can request a new code and receive it via SMS.

Requirement: You provided your mobile number during your radiological examination.
content.svnLogin404ErrorText:
Login with the provided data is not possible!
Please check your inputs or try again later!
content.svnLogin401ErrorText:
Login with the provided data is not possible!
Please check your inputs or try again later!
content.pinRenewErrorText:
Sending a text message is not possible with the provided data!
Please check your inputs or try again later!
content.requestCodeSuccessText: A text message with the Code has just been sent to the entered number.
content.nosvnLoginHeadingText: Login WITHOUT an austrian Social Security Number:
content.nosvnLoginHintText: You don't have an SSN (no e-card). You received an AUTH code during your examination
content.nosvnLoginNoAuthcodeHintText:
Without an Austrian social security number (e-card), you cannot request a code via SMS.

Please contact your radiologist/institute.
content.nosvnLoginErrorText:
Login with the provided data is not possible!
Please check your inputs or try again later!
